#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    long long total;

    while(t--)

    {

        long long  n,m;

        cin>>n>>m;


        total=n*m;

        if(total%2)

       cout<<(total)/2<<"/"<<total;

        else

            cout<<"1/2";

        cout<<endl;

    }

    return 0;

}
